subtitle: A complete and delicious meal with goat's cheese and couscous.

method.text: Place aubergines in a colander. Sprinkle with a little salt on both sides. Leave for 20 min. Rinse and wipe dry with kitchen paper.
Place tomatoes, courgettes and aubergines on a baking tray. Drizzle 75 ml of the olive oil over the vegetables. Roast for 40-50 min or until vegetables are golden and cooked through. Leave to cool.
Pour 45 ml of the oil into a bowl. Add the basil leaves and seasoning to taste. Toss the aubergine and courgette in the marinade. Set aside until ready to serve.
Meanwhile, heat the stock and remaining olive oil in a large pan until boiling. Remove from the heat and stir in the couscous. Cover and set aside for 5 min.

Stir the parsley, mint and lemon juice into the couscous before piling onto individual serving plates. Arrange the tomato halves, drained aubergines and courgette slices alternately around the couscous. Then lay the cheese slices in the middle of each salad. Grill if liked.
Mix the vinegar, pepper sauce, oil and basil marinade. Season to taste. Drizzle equally over each serving. Sprinkle a little paprika over the top.

title: Mediterranean roast vegetables
